text:
Despite the uncertainties amid rising #COVID19 cases around the globe, #oil prices traded higher on Friday on optimism around the #vaccine roll-out. #WTI jumped 1.44% to trade at $49.24/barrel; #Brent surged 1.69% to trade at $52.37.
#Commodities #OPEC
Losses may exceed deposits https://t.co/g8ceBGewar
